quotes.quote: True intelligence requires fabulous imagination.
If you allow yourself to feel fabulous, you are fabulous.
If one could look this fabulous, one had an obligation to.
If you don't feel fabulous, you have deviated from the path of who-you-really-are.
If you can convince yourself that you look fabulous, you can save yourself the trouble of primping.
The most important thing, darling, is to live a fabulous life. As long as it’s fabulous, I don’t care how long it is.
Act as young as you feel. You're not getting older; you're getting more entitled to be your fabulous self.
The fabulous places I've been, wonderful things that've happened, great people I've met ought to make a story.
If we spend our days waiting for fabulous roses we could miss the beauty and wonder of the tiny forget-me-nots that are all around us.
Let's just be fabulously where we are and who we are. You be you and I'll be me, today and today and today, and let's trust the future to tomorrow.
If anyone tells you it's impossible to be fabulous and smart and make a ton of money using math, well, they can just get in line behind you - and kiss your math.
People who have fabulous childhoods have this sense that nothing is ever going to be that good again. With me, I have the sense that nothing is going to be that bad.
If you have enough people sitting around telling you you're wonderful, then you start believing you're fabulous, then someone tells you you stink and you believe that too!

Your audacious life goals are fabulous. We're proud of you for having them. But it's possible that those goals are designed to distract you from the thing that's really frightening you--the shift in daily habits that would mean a re-invention of how you see yourself.
The loner who looks fabulous is one of the most vulnerable loners of all.
Nothing here is more fabulous than the truth.
There is no downside to winning. It feels forever fabulous.
When your own romantic life is falling apart, everyone else's looks fabulous.
Think for a minute about what makes you fabulous and how you can celebrate it.
Food is fabulous, and having a good relationship with it will make you healthy and happy.
Wear a fabulous smile, great jewelry and know that you are totally and utterly in control.
We remember childhood as the fabulous years of our lives, and nations remember their childhood as fabulous years.
Archive material is a fabulous starting point - individual documents are like signposted roads, heading to a variety of intriguing possibilities.
It's fabulous when you do that, when you discover somebody who you like, when you kind of feel those feelings, even though he articulates them better.
Making people laugh is a really fabulous thing because it means you're getting deep inside somebody, into their psyche, and their ability to look at themselves.
All that is told of the sea has a fabulous sound to an inhabitant of the land and all its products have a certain fabulous quality, as if they belonged to another planet.

There's nothing more fabulous than an adult saying to you, "I think that you might like this one [book]." So I'm grateful every time that happens. It's an amazing thing that people care that passionately.
What looks absolutely fabulous in rehearsal can fall flat in front of an audience. The audience dictates what you do or don't change.

Learning something new is a fabulous way to be refreshed. When work can grind you down, something about learning a new activity thrills the soul. It reminds you that the world is bigger than your desk and your to-do list.
Women, you can have it all - a loving man, devoted husband, loving children, a fabulous career.
Fabulous is as fabulous does.
Everything was fabulous, even our breakdowns.
